      • fileToListSkipComments

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> fileToListSkipComments(java.lang.String fileFullName,
                                                                      char commentChar)
                                                               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                                      java.io.IOException
        Read a given file and skip the comment lines and return it as a list. If you don't want to skip the comments lines, then pass ' ' as the commentChar.
        Parameters:
        fileFullName - the given file fully qualified name
        commentChar - the comment line starts with this char
        Returns:
        the list of strings containing each line
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException
